html:
2 Nephi 21:10

Commencing with verse 10, Isaiah leaves his description of millennial conditions and returns to the recovery of the remnant of Israel prior to the Second Coming.

10 And in that day there shall be a root of Jesse, which shall stand for an ensign of the people; to it shall the Gentiles seek: and his rest shall be glorious.
10 And in that day there shall be a root of Jesse, which shall stand for an ensign of the people; to it shall the Gentiles seek; and his rest shall be glorious.
